title: Geth do not acceps transaction from parity
body:
Geth do not acceps transaction from parity. It works when i send: geth -> parity, geth <-> geth.
Geth/v1.5.0-unstable-6952fe3a/linux/go1.7
Parity/v1.3.9-beta-e9987c4-20161021/x86_64-windows-msvc/rustc1.12.0

this could be a duplicate to: https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/issues/2769

I had a similar issue when running a single geth miner on a private network and attaching other non-mining nodes. My solution/workaround was to set up a second mining node.
I think this is a different issue, because when i use two clients of Geth and the non-miner client has `--autodag` parameter, then everything works as excepted.

Update:
I have tried again send transaction between geth <-> geth using the `--autodag` parameter, but now dont works.
